metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44964 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Use after free in garbage collector and finalizer of lgc.c in Lua interpreter 5.4.0~5.4.3 allows attackers to perform Sandbox Escape via a crafted script file.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Jihoi Kim, Sunghun Oh, Minseok Kang, MinJoong Kim, WooSun Kang, and HyungChan Kim

criterions.comment: lua5.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
lua5.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
lua5.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
